attributes.action: Re-open Alconbury Airfield for Civil Flying
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
RAF Alconbury is a United States Air Force installation adjacent to the Stukeleys, near Alconbury and Huntingdon, Cambridgeshire in the United Kingdom.

Until 1995, the base possessed an airfield, but that has since been ceded to the host nation and turned into an industrial area.

I would like to see the Airfield re-opened for civil flying because this would be very popular with aviation enthusiasts and would also boost the local econony and tourism.

Sign The Petition!
